185675264.review:
This game is honestly so goddamn fun with fun movement mechanics, shooting, upgrades, story etc. It's so ridiculously over the top that it's actually amazing. While at first I was a bit confused and whelmed, it very quickly picks up and gets you into the action. It's short but damn is it worth it if you really want a game that you can go in kill a bunch of aliens and enjoy yourself whilst doing it. The game ain't to difficult but sometimes has some enemies that will kick your ass. The story is also over the top and just very "japan's interpretation of America" which is amazing and funny as hell. Definitely worth it please just play it

9 / 10

185026337.review: Bad graphics, the last bosses is complete garbage tag teaming you and zapping your shields, they take almost no damage with any weapon on casual auto. It was like the developers saying, " enjoy the game until we cheat you of victory." It was on sale for a good reason.

185023820.review:
AMAZING GAME. Pure adrenaline, awesome mechanics, phenomenal visuals and designs; overall a masterpiece of a game. 

The only letdown aspect of the game has got to be the story; the game was full of LONG ASS cutscenes (which eventually gets repetitive and boring) with little to no character development, in addition to the overall story being 'decent' at best. 

Albeit, as mentioned earlier, the mechanics of this game are otherworldly - one of the best in any shooter game... Hell, even by today's standards, this game looks pretty good!

 I'd totally recommend this game if you were a fan of Dead Space, Metal Gear Rising and Bayonetta. Truly a hidden gem; ONE of the most SLEPT ON games of all time.

184956739.review:
Giocato sì e no 10 anni fa su PS3 e finalmente riassaporato su PC!
Che dire? Un TPS frenetico con una grande varietà di armi, nemici aggressivi, vari e originali, un design delle mappe intrigante e spesso sfidante. La trama è banale e spesso i compagni sono più un ostacolo che un beneficio, ma a parte questo è un gioco valido e nel suo complesso molto originale.
Consigliato agli amanti degli sparatutti vecchio stampo e dei videogiochi giapponesi, perché sì, anche se sono i soliti americani contro dei robot russi, i combattimenti corpo a corpo, i boss e molto altro hanno quel sapore da anime/videogioco giapponese che fa da ciliegina sulla torta al gioco.

Voto 9/10. Da giocare alla difficoltà massima per una buona dose di bestemmie!

184941506.review:
Vanquish is a great game, but it's not for everyone.
It mixes fun, fast combat with linear but challenging levels to create a unique gameplay experience.
When you read the reviews on this game, you'll see a lot of people saying "The story sucks!" Be aware: that's the point. Vanquish is one of those games that's not meant to be taken seriously. The gameplay was obviously the focus, and the story exists solely to give the player a reason to travel through these weird cyber environments. I'm not sure how anyone can look at something so clearly over the top like Vanquish and go "Aah, yes. I'm sure the story is emasculate."
Another thing you see is "the suit function is never used meaningfully!" And, while partially true, I found that the suit works best when you *make* your own uses for it. Use it for repositioning, get cool retreating shots, use it to quickly grab weapons on the run. It's a tool that the game doesn't give you a prompt to use. The player has to figure out when and how to use it in combat on their own, creating their own unique play style in the process.

The biggest critique I personally have is the length of the game.
Vanquish is a lot like Metal Gear Rising where the game is insanely fun. . . but painfully short. I was able to zoom through his game on a blind playthrough and reach the final boss in a just a few hours. The final boss felt like a mid-boss, like there should be more after him. But, no, it just ends.

Still an insanely fun game that's worth your time.
9/10

The best part of this game is the suit boost feature and it's barely ever required or meaningfully implemented in the campaign.

184471387.review:
Ну что можно сказать, данная игра была в планах ещё на пс3, но в те далёкие года, когда она была запущена, было принято решение, что в 20 кадров играть желания нет.
На 360 руки так и не дошли, на пс4 желание играть не было так, как не было перевода на русский язык.
И теперь Стим дек в руках. Игра куплена. Поставлен русификатор, но на деке с русским языком игра не включается. 
Но настрой уже был, и пришлось идти в зелёный магазин.
Игра пройдена, и эти 5 часов были проведены с кайфом, как данный графон даже в урезаном состоянии работал на пс3 вопрос открытый. 
Картинка однозначно топ, посмотреть бы, как она будет работать на торговом ПК в 4к.
Что по геймплею, минусов я не нашел, крутой экшн с отточенным игровым процессом. Уничтожение противника проходит под бешеную динамику. 
Сюжет простой, но интересный. Боевик есть боевик.
Итог. Если давно хотели пройти игру. Даже не думайте.

184328664.review: One of the greatest games ever made. Must buy.

184273156.review:
My knees hurt... (9/10)

But Seriously, The cut-scenes in this game are outstanding, featuring great camera angles and great dialogue.

The game play is incredibly fun, with smooth and engaging movement mechanics. It's unfortunate this title never received a sequel—I’d gladly pay for another installment.

The ending credits are a standout feature, offering a creative twist by turning them into a mini-game where you shoot asteroids with the developers' faces on them. It's a rare and enjoyable way to make the credits entertaining.

183935459.review:
Bom, vamos lá !
Vanquish, é mais um game que não tive o prazer de jogar na época, e meus amigos, que jogo sensacional e divertido, bem frenético e com muitas loucuras, história envolvente e com personagens marcantes, gráficos bonitos para a época, típico de uma obra feita pelo saudoso e lenda da indústria de video-games, Shinji Mikami ( Resident Evil e The Evil Within). Porém, o jogo é curto, podendo ser finalizado entre 4 a 6 horas, sendo dividido em 5 atos com 5 capítulos em média, dando uma vibe de Gears of War e Resistance com hordas de inimigos a todo momento. Entretanto, a variedade de inimigos e armamentos disponíveis é medíocre, repetindo os mesmos incansavelmente.
Portanto, se vocês querem um jogo para passar o final de semana e ter uma bela gameplay e história, recomendo fortemente, mas se buscam algo para passar horas, fiquem longe. Particularmente, eu amei e recomendo demais e esse é meu veredito, espero que tenham gostado, um forte abraço e fuiii !!!

8/10
Один из интереснейших эксклюзивов на мыльной станции игр 3. Интересный геемплей, музыка не хватает звезд с неба, но и выключить ее не хочется, сюжет в помойку. К сожалению если не тупить проходится за 4 часа, но и за это спасибо.

183697131.review: I've been anticipating playing Vanquish for a long time. All the gameplay clips I've seen have showcased how fun, intense and insane this third person shooter looked. Having now played it for a good few hours, I was left a bit disappointed. The game has great shooting and movement mechanics, making the gameplay loop very satisfying. However, after three hours or so, this loop becomes very repetitive and doesn't do much that's interesting. The boss fights, while they can be exhilarating, don't do enough to challenge you. Coupled with some seriously goofy characters and a threadbare, incoherent story, the game fell flat on its face. 6/10.

183598760.review: Great art direction, cool cinematics, and decent gameplay, although the story is kinda poo poo.
